subject: Web3
title: Types of DAOs
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Types of DAOs.

hook.text: Not all DAOs are the same. There are investment DAOs, social DAOs, protocol DAOs, and collector DAOs.

buildup.text: Protocol DAOs govern DeFi platforms. Investment DAOs pool money to buy assets. Social DAOs are exclusive communities.

discovery.text: Collector DAOs formed to buy expensive items â€” like the group that tried to purchase a copy of the US Constitution.

twist.text: Service DAOs hire contributors for bounties. They function like decentralized freelancing agencies.

climax.text: DAOs aren't one thing. They're a flexible structure being applied to every type of human organization.

punchline.text: There's a DAO for investing, socializing, collecting, and working.

quiz.question: What does an investment DAO do?
options: Pools money from members to buy assets collectively
